author: olegk
msg: HTTPCORE-240: DefaultConnectingIOReactor leaks a socket descriptor if the session request fails

author: kristwaa
msg: Read table statistics from the system table using READ_UNCOMMITTED to avoid
deadlocks with transactions inserting new statistics entries.
Modified getDescriptorViaIndexMinon to allow returning multiple tuple
descriptors also when isolation level is READ_UNCOMMITTED.
